modShortDescription: Minor tweaks to the amounts of stamina that various weapons and tools use, to offer better balance.
modDescription:
Minor tweaks to the amounts of [stamina](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-stamina/) that various weapons and tools use, to offer better balance.

This mod works on servers with no client side installation necessary, or on single player games.

**[Download](https://imadeyoursite.com/7days/BModStaminaBalance.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24958-brians-mods-for-alpha-196/).

**Credits:** [Dhlmaster](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/dhlmaster/)
